item.text: After this the Lord appointed seventy-two others and sent them on ahead of him two by two into every town and place where he himself was about to go.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “The <st data-num="2326" class="">harvest</st> is <st data-num="4183" class="">plentiful</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2040" class="">workers</st> are <st data-num="3641" class="">few</st>. <st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="1189" class="">ask</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> of the <st data-num="2326" class="">harvest</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3704">to</st> <st data-num="1544">send out</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2040" class="">workers</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2326" class="">harvest</st>.

<st data-num="5217" class="">Go</st>! I<n id="1" /> am <st data-num="649" class="">sending</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="649">out</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="704" class="">lambs</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722 3319" class="">surrounded</st> by <st data-num="3074" class="">wolves</st>.<n id="3" />

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="941" class="">carry</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="905">money bag</st>,<n id="2" /> a <st data-num="4082">traveler’s bag</st>,<n id="3" /> or <st data-num="5266" class="">sandals</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="782" class="">greet</st> <st data-num="3367">no one</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1519 3739">Whenever</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> a <st data-num="3614">house</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘May <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st><n id="3" /> be on <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house!’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1437">if</st> a <st data-num="1515" class="">peace-loving</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">person</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> will <st data-num="1879">remain on</st> <st data-num="846">him</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>, it will <st data-num="344" class="">return</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3306" class="">Stay</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> that <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drinking</st> what <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> give you,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2040" class="">worker</st> <st data-num="514" class="">deserves</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3408" class="">pay</st>.<n id="3" /> Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3327">move around</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.

<st data-num="1519 3739">Whenever</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> a <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the people<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1209" class="">welcome</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> what is <st data-num="3908">set before</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="2323" class="">Heal</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="772" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">that</st> town<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, ‘The <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st><n id="3" /> has <st data-num="1448" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">upon</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you!’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1519 3739">whenever</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> a <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the people<n id="3" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">welcome</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1831" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="4113" class="">streets</st><n id="5" /> and <st data-num="3004">say</st>,

‘<st data-num="2532">Even</st> the <st data-num="2868" class="">dust</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="1" /> that <st data-num="2853" class="">clings</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> we <st data-num="631">wipe off</st><n id="2" /> against <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4133" class="">Nevertheless</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this:</st> The <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="1448" class="">come.’</st><n id="4" />
I tell you, it will be more bearable on that day for Sodom than for that town!
“Woe to you, Chorazin! Woe to you, Bethsaida! For if the miracles done in you had been done in Tyre and Sidon, they would have repented long ago, sitting in sackcloth and ashes.

<st data-num="4133" class="">But</st> it will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="414" class="">more bearable</st> for <st data-num="5184" class="">Tyre</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4605">Sidon</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!
And you, Capernaum, will you be exalted to heaven? No, you will be thrown down to Hades!
“The one who listens to you listens to me, and the one who rejects you rejects me, and the one who rejects me rejects the one who sent me.”
Then the seventy-two returned with joy, saying, “Lord, even the demons submit to us in your name!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">fall</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="796" class="">lightning</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.

<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, I have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> to <st data-num="3961" class="">tread</st><n id="1" /> on <st data-num="3789" class="">snakes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4651" class="">scorpions</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">full</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">force</st> of the <st data-num="2190" class="">enemy</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> will<n id="4" /> <st data-num="91" class="">hurt</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.
Nevertheless, do not rejoice that the spirits submit to you, but rejoice that your names stand written in heaven.”

On that same occasion Jesus rejoiced in the Holy Spirit and said, “I praise you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, because you have hidden these things from the wise and intelligent and revealed them to little children. Yes, Father, for this was your gracious will.
All things have been given to me by my Father. No one knows who the Son is except the Father, or who the Father is except the Son and anyone to whom the Son decides to reveal him.”
Then Jesus turned to his disciples and said privately, “Blessed are the eyes that see what you see!
For I tell you that many prophets and kings longed to see what you see but did not see it, and to hear what you hear but did not hear it.”
Now an expert in religious law stood up to test Jesus, saying, “Teacher, what must I do to inherit eternal life?”

He <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> is <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>? <st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> do you <st data-num="314" class="">understand</st> it?”<n id="1" />
The expert answered, “Love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, with all your strength, and with all your mind, and love your neighbor as yourself.”
Jesus said to him, “You have answered correctly; do this, and you will live.”
But the expert, wanting to justify himself, said to Jesus, “And who is my neighbor?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “A <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> was <st data-num="2597">going down</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2410" class="">Jericho</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4045">fell into the hands</st> of <st data-num="3027" class="">robbers</st>, who <st data-num="1562" class="">stripped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2007 4127">beat</st><n id="5" /> him up, and <st data-num="565">went off</st>, <st data-num="863" class="">leaving</st> him <st data-num="2253">half dead</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4795" class="">chance</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="2409" class="">priest</st> was <st data-num="2597" class="">going down</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> when he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="846">injured man</st>,<n id="3" /> he <st data-num="492" class="">passed by<n id="4" /> on the other side</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161">So</st> <st data-num="3668" class="">too</st> a <st data-num="3019" class="">Levite</st>, when he <st data-num="2064">came up</st> to<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> him,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="492">passed by on the other side</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="4541" class="">Samaritan</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">who</st> was <st data-num="3593" class="">traveling</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="2596" class="">where</st> the <st data-num="846">injured man</st><n id="4" /> was, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> him, he <st data-num="4697" class="">felt compassion</st> for him.<n id="5" />

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4334">went up to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2611" class="">bandaged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5134" class="">wounds</st>, <st data-num="2022" class="">pouring</st> <st data-num="1637" class="">olive oil</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> on them. <st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="4" /> he <st data-num="1913" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="2934" class="">animal</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> an <st data-num="3829" class="">inn</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1959" class="">took care of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="839">next day</st> he <st data-num="1544">took out</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="1220">silver coins</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> them to the <st data-num="3830" class="">innkeeper</st>, <st data-num="3004">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="1959">Take care of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739">whatever</st> <st data-num="5100">else</st> you <st data-num="4325" class="">spend</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="591" class="">repay</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> when <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1880">come back</st> this way.’<n id="3" />

<st data-num="5101" class="">Which</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> a <st data-num="4139" class="">neighbor</st><n id="1" /> to the man who <st data-num="1706" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the hands of the <st data-num="3027" class="">robbers</st>?”
The expert in religious law said, “The one who showed mercy to him.” So Jesus said to him, “Go and do the same.”
Now as they went on their way, Jesus entered a certain village where a woman named Martha welcomed him as a guest.

<st data-num="3592">She</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="79" class="">sister</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">named</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="3869" class="">sat</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="191" class="">listened</st> to what <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">said</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st> was <st data-num="4049" class="">distracted</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1248" class="">preparations</st> she had to make,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">so</st><n id="3" /> she <st data-num="2186" class="">came up</st> to him and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3199" class="">care</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sister</st> has <st data-num="2641" class="">left</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="1247" class="">do all the work</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3441">alone</st>? <st data-num="3004" class="">Tell</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4878" class="">help</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st>, <st data-num="3136" class="">Martha</st>,<n id="3" /> you are <st data-num="3309" class="">worried</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5182" class="">troubled</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4183">many things</st>,
but one thing is needed. Mary has chosen the best part; it will not be taken away from her.”
